title: How to write a letter to my school principal about my absence from school for five days not less than 300 words - Quora

response.answer_text: To The Principal ABC School City space Subject - Explanation for leave space Sir/Ma’am I am a student of your school/college in —— class. I was recently on leave for five days from —— to ——. I couldn’t come because ——. I apologize for not informing earlier but I promise I will make up for the studies and lectures I missed. I will be grateful if no action is taken against me. space Yours sincerely XYZ
